sentences.en: He pledged to unify the city's political factions.
sentences.cn: 他保证要统一全市的政治小集团。

sentences.en: However, any interpretation that seeks to unify all of the novel's diverse elements is bound to be somewhat unconvincing.
sentences.cn: 然而，任何试图将小说的所有不同元素统一起来的解读，都必然有些难以令人信服。

sentences.en: The new leader hopes to unify the country.
sentences.cn: 新领袖希望把国家统一起来。
